mapper.select: SELECT RGCODE FROM REGION WHERE RGNAME = #{mregion}

SELECT UBNICKNAME, UBCODE, UBRGCODE, UBSELLBUY, UBMID, UBTITLE, UBCONTENTS, TO_CHAR(UBDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') UBDATE, UBMAINIMG, UBDETAILIMG, UBSTATE, NVL(ZZIMCOUNT, 0) ZZIMCOUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, UBCODE, UBRGCODE, UBSELLBUY, UBMID, UBTITLE, UBCONTENTS, UBDATE, UBMAINIMG, UBDETAILIMG, UBSTATE FROM (SELECT * FROM USEDBOARDS ORDER BY UBCODE) WHERE
UBRGCODE = #{paging.searchVal} AND
UBSELLBUY = #{paging.sellBuy} AND UBSTATE = 1
AND UBTITLE LIKE '%'||#{paging.keyword}||'%' OR UBCONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{paging.keyword}||'%'
AND UBMID LIKE (SELECT MID FROM MEMBERS WHERE MNICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{paging.keyword}||'%')
AND #{paging.searchType} LIKE '%'||#{paging.keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY UBCODE DESC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ZZIM_VIEW ON UBCODE = ZZUBCODE, MNICKNAME_VIEW WHERE MID = UBMID
AND RN BETWEEN 1 AND 8
AND RN BETWEEN #{paging.startRow} AND #{paging.endRow}
ORDER BY UBDATE DESC

SELECT UBNICKNAME, UBCODE, UBRGCODE, UBSELLBUY, UBMID, UBTITLE, UBCONTENTS, TO_CHAR(UBDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') UBDATE, UBMAINIMG, UBDETAILIMG, UBSTATE, NVL(ZZIMCOUNT, 0) ZZIMCOUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, UBCODE, UBRGCODE, UBSELLBUY, UBMID, UBTITLE, UBCONTENTS, UBDATE, UBMAINIMG, UBDETAILIMG, UBSTATE FROM (SELECT * FROM USEDBOARDS ORDER BY UBCODE)
WHERE UBRGCODE = #{searchVal} AND UBSELLBUY = #{sellBuy} AND UBSTATE = 1
AND UBTITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR UBCONTENTS LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND UBMID LIKE (SELECT MID FROM MEMBERS WHERE MNICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
AND #{searchType} LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY UBCODE DESC ) LEFT OUTER JOIN ZZIM_VIEW ON UBCODE = ZZUBCODE, MNICKNAME_VIEW WHERE MID = UBMID AND RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
ORDER BY UBDATE DESC
